resources.string: Please enable the accessibility service first

⚠️ Expert Mode ⚠️

This feature is for advanced users who understand Android view IDs and content descriptions.

Enter your custom rules here, one per line.

Example:
com.example.app##viewId=com.example.app:id/distracting_element##desc=Distracting content##color=FFFFFF
Invalid rules format. Please check your rules and try again.
Disable all rules for this app
This rule may require English to be the main display language.

Note for first-time users: Feed elements are not hidden by default; you can hide them manually below. Moreover, in case an overlay does not hide, then try changing apps, pressing the home button, or locking the phone.
